text:
Put up an issue based on the community forum post <@UCSKU31SA> posted about. What do you guys think? does it make sense to have this maybe in theme.css so people have a good starting point for styling their forms?
<https://github.com/TheWebTech/CrankShaft/issues/92>
just made a github repo for it so it can be updated as necessary, but seems like something that could be easily folded into crankshaft
we need a high five emojii
